channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- NetComm Wireless G LTE Light Industrial M2M Router (NWL-25) with firmware 2.0.29.11 and prior.
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- NetComm Wireless G LTE Light Industrial M2M Router (NWL-25) with firmware 2.0.29.11 and prior.

item.title: CVE-2018-14784|2024-09-16T22:29:45.384Z -- ics-cert -- netcomm%20wireless%20g%20lte%20light%20industrial%20m2m%20router%20%28nwl-25%29%20with%20firmware%202.0.29.11%20and%20prior.
item.description: NetComm Wireless G LTE Light Industrial M2M Router (NWL-25) with firmware 2.0.29.11 and prior. The device is vulnerable to several cross-site scripting attacks, allowing a remote attacker to run arbitrary code on the device.

item.title: CVE-2018-14782|2024-09-16T17:34:12.905Z -- ics-cert -- netcomm%20wireless%20g%20lte%20light%20industrial%20m2m%20router%20%28nwl-25%29%20with%20firmware%202.0.29.11%20and%20prior.
item.description: NetComm Wireless G LTE Light Industrial M2M Router (NWL-25) with firmware 2.0.29.11 and prior. The device allows access to configuration files and profiles without authenticating the user.

item.title: CVE-2018-14783|2024-09-16T16:13:07.238Z -- ics-cert -- netcomm%20wireless%20g%20lte%20light%20industrial%20m2m%20router%20%28nwl-25%29%20with%20firmware%202.0.29.11%20and%20prior.
item.description: NetComm Wireless G LTE Light Industrial M2M Router (NWL-25) with firmware 2.0.29.11 and prior. A cross-site request forgery condition can occur, allowing an attacker to change passwords of the device remotely.
